original_text: and also Obed-edom and his sixty-eight brothers, while Obed-edom, the son of Jeduthun, and Hosah were to be gatekeepers.
korean_text: 오벧에돔과 그의 형제 육십팔 명과 여두둔의 아들 오벧에돔과 호사를 문지기로 삼았고

sentences.original_text: and also Obed-edom and his sixty-eight brothers
sentences.korean_translation: 또한 오베에돔과 그의 형제 육십팔 명

sentences.original_text: while Obed-edom, the son of Jeduthun, and Hosah
